snippet: At JPMorgan Chase's investor day last week, the bank's chief executive, Jamie Dimon, told a joke about pay at newspapers, comments that some took as a mockery of a struggling industry.
abstract: At JPMorgan Chase's investor day last week, the bank's chief executive, Jamie Dimon, told a joke about pay at newspapers, comments that some took as a mockery of a struggling industry.

headline.main: Why Banking Chiefs Shouldn't Tell Jokes
